title: How to Make Peruvian Chicken Soup

steps.headline: Marinate the chicken with salt and pepper.
steps.description: Add any other spices you want on your chicken.

steps.headline: Heat an oiled pan on medium to high heat.
Add the garlic, onion, and serrano chili to the pan.
steps.description: Stir and cook everything until the onion has become a little transparent or clear.

steps.headline: Add the chicken to the mixture and cook for about 5 more minutes.
Add the vegetables.
steps.description: Add the peas, cilantro, red pepper, and corn to the pan and stir for a minute. Add the rice, potatoes, and chicken broth and place the mixture on a simmer for about 40 minutes or until the chicken is well cooked and the potatoes are tender.

text: Marinate the chicken with salt and pepper. Add any other spices you want on your chicken. Heat an oiled pan on medium to high heat.  Add the garlic, onion, and serrano chili to the pan. Stir and cook everything until the onion has become a little transparent or clear. Add the chicken to the mixture and cook for about 5 more minutes.  Add the vegetables. Add the peas, cilantro, red pepper, and corn to the pan and stir for a minute. Add the rice, potatoes, and chicken broth and place the mixture on a simmer for about 40 minutes or until the chicken is well cooked and the potatoes are tender. Finished.
